definition: not to be concerned/regardless of/no matter
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Guan

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
in any case/no matter what
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: of undetermined status/unregulated

it doesn't matter whether a cat is white or black; as long as it catches mice it's a good cat (variant of a Sichuanese saying used in a speech by Deng Xiaoping 鄧小平|邓小平[Deng4 Xiao3 ping2] in 1962, usually associated with his economic reforms starting in 1978, in which pragmatism was favored over ideological purity)
pinyin: bu4 guan3 bai2 mao1 hei1 mao1 , zhuo1 zhu4 lao3 shu3 jiu4 shi4 hao3 mao1
containing_words.word: 不管白貓黑貓，捉住老鼠就是好貓

definition: to eat without working (idiom)/to take one's pay and not care about the rest
(coll.) to wash one's hands of a matter
to stand by and pay no heed/to ignore

sentences.english: She never learned how to read a milometer,or any meter.
sentences.chinese: 不管是里程錶，還是什麼表，她從來就不會看。

sentences.english: Either you believe in freedom and middle class trade policies or you dont.
sentences.chinese: 不管你信不信自由和中產階級貿易政策。

sentences.english: Reasoning does not seem to work with them.
sentences.chinese: 跟他們講道理似乎不管用。

sentences.english: Our guests, no matter where you come from, please make yourself at home.
sentences.chinese: 不管遠近都是客人，請不用客氣。

sentences.english: At the very least, that will make it hard for a future President to keep tax-cut promises.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎樣，下一任總統將很難兌現他們減稅的承諾。

sentences.english: His love is not conditioned by your response.
sentences.chinese: 不管你做何反應，他的愛總是無條件的。

sentences.english: "Labour won't stand by and let this continue, " David Cunliffe said.
sentences.chinese: 工黨不會坐視不管，任由這種情形持續。

sentences.english: This hands-off approach could lead to huge risks for the companies.
sentences.chinese: 這種放手不管的作法可能會給公司造成巨大風險。

sentences.english: Speak frankly, I pray you, be it for life or death.
sentences.chinese: 我請你坦率地講出來，不管我是該活還是該死。

sentences.english: Now whether or not any of this is true, believe me, is neither here nor there.
sentences.chinese: 不管這些正確與否，相信我，關鍵不在於此。

sentences.english: I ordered the best wine on the menu, regardless of price or taste.
sentences.chinese: 我叫了菜單上最好的甜酒，不管價錢多少，味道好壞。

sentences.english: No matter what hurdles are placed in our way, somehow we always find a way.
sentences.chinese: 不管我們事業上有多麼困難，我們總會設法闖過去。

sentences.english: Because whoever that professor is, we need to shoot him.
sentences.chinese: 因爲不管這位教授是誰，我們都要斃了他”。

sentences.english: It shows real people, regardless of who can recognize them.
sentences.chinese: 不管誰能認出他們，真實的人物出現在裏面。

sentences.english: Regardless of what your interest is, you can find something that you like to do.
sentences.chinese: 不管你的興趣是什麼，你都能找到你喜歡做的事情。

sentences.english: No matter how difficult English may be, you should do your best to learn it.
sentences.chinese: 不管英語有多麼難，你都應該盡你最大的努力來學它。

definition: no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
or/still/nevertheless/had better
or
in a word/in short/in brief
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
even/even if/even though/no matter how
if only/so long as
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
in any case/no matter what
or/either one or the other
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
capital city/metropolis
surname Du
even if/even though
granted that/even if
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
